basic_info.summary: Transitioning into Web Development. Experienced creating Customer Service Solutions and increasing revenue.

experiences.details:
As the Assistant Manager my duties consit of managing the schedule of my associates, actively supervising inventory
levels and ordering new inventory as needed. The day to day operations of the business are also handled by me.
Implemented a customer service strategy that introduced customer service standars in order to expand our repeat customer base, this implementation resulted in 
a 23% revenue increase for 2017 (compared to 2016) and 35% increase for 2018(also based on 2016). With the suport
of the shareholders introduced new product classes that proceeded to increase revenue and cash flow.
  - Increased revenue
  - Introduced Customer Service Standards

Part of the Front Desk Staff that ensured guest satisfaction at all times. Duties included
managing reservations/cancelations and inventory, updating internal databases, constant use of 
Microsoft Office. Promptly resolve conflicts while maintining peak customer service standards.
Assit other departments as needed, along with other clerical functions.

projects.intro: These are some of the projects we have completed at 4Geeks Academy so far. This list will be updated as the  class advances.

assignments.title: Bootstrap Card
assignments.tagline: A responsive postcard created using Bootsrap 4.

assignments.title: Photofeed
assignments.tagline: A responsive landing page with a navbar, cards, and other Bootstrap components.

assignments.title: Instagram Inspired Photofeed
assignments.tagline: A responsive website based on Instagram's model that incorporated more advanced Bootstrap elements.
